short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly search and access your focus list with Vera

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the Vera extension, set the Chrome™ default search to Yahoo, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy. 

Terms of Use: https://www.theveraweb.com/terms-of-use  
Privacy Policy: https://www.theveraweb.com/privacy-policy  

Click the app icon to access your focus task list.
